title: Winter Immune Support with TCM
excerpt: Warming foods and acupuncture can help strengthen your defenses during cold months.
author: Dr. Huang
contentMarkdown:
Winter is a time to conserve energy and nourish the body's reserves. TCM emphasizes warmth, rest, and immunity support.

## Winter Essentials

- Soups and stews with warming spices
- Earlier bedtimes
- Gentle movement to keep Qi flowing

## Clinic Support

Acupuncture and herbs can reduce the frequency of colds and improve recovery.
